snippet.title: E3 2012: 5 mobile games to watch for
snippet.description:
* As mobile games migrate to powerful smartphones and tablets that are becoming direct competition to portable gaming devices such as Nintendo 3DS and PS Vita, the E3 convention has become a prime stage for game publishers to showcase new titles.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/06/07/tech/gaming-gadgets/e3-mobile-games/index.html

snippet.title: The top 10 gaming stories of 2011
snippet.description:
* It was a year of crippling -- and creative -- hacks, a year of blockbuster sequels and (yet again) a year of slinging vengeful birds at corpulent pigs.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/12/30/tech/gaming-gadgets/top-gaming-stories-2011/index.html

snippet.title: Preview: Summer's hottest video games
snippet.description:
* Summer is typically a slow time for video games as fans ditch their controllers in favor of sunny seaside vacations or the pleasures of the great outdoors. But this year, a number of high-profile new releases hope to buck that trend.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/TECH/gaming.gadgets/05/06/summer.video.games.steinberg/index.html

snippet.title: How game companies brought E3 news to gamers' homes
snippet.description:
* While 46,800 attendees spent the weekend recuperating from the video game industry's largest annual convention, diehard gamers were catching up on all the news from their couches.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/TECH/gaming.gadgets/06/14/e3.news.home/index.html
